pkgmetadata.longdescription: Recently I've been baking a number of pies [1-2] and I've found it useful to collect commonly used code in one place. This library contains a bunch of, often exotic, bits of code that make python so much easier to write in, especially when interacting with asyncio and concurrent threads.[1] https://github.com/aiidateam/kiwipy/[2] https://github.com/aiidateam/plumpy
